column2: Here producing powerful common and magical weapons, armors and items. Most sturdy undead warriors are equipping here and than to become known as "Black knights".
In this ghettos are contained many slaves for vampire needs, necromantic deeds, hard work and in time of need for war as soldiers.
Special port for vampire members of queen's court.
In this majestic chambers staying for rest only members of sisterhood.
Castle has builded with lahmian style.
When by hundred years witch hunters and knights are trying to assault your demensne, their corpses are collected by your necromants to make powerfull warriors.
City has builded with lahmian style.
Temple has builded with lahmian style.
